title: Xbox's Phil Spencer Responds to PlayStation's "Game Pass" - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.17.22
description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/KINDAFUNNY16 and use code KINDAFUNNY16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!
 
https://roosterteeth.surveysparrow.com/s/Roost-Partner-Survey---Kinda-Funny/tt-8b14a4dcb1

Blessing and Tim talk all about PlayStation's Project Spartacus and what Xbox's Phil Spencer had to say about it.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is recording later today and it’s our Re-Review of Horizon Zero Dawn. I’ve played the DLC, Greg has been playing, and Janet has platinumed the game. Get your questions and write-ins into Patreon.com/kindafunnygames to be a part of the show and catch that episode when it goes up for everyone tomorrow.
Also! There’s a new episode of Xcast that went up over the weekend with the full crew talking about Xbox expectations for exclusives in 2022. Catch that right now on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
And lastly! Help us out by filling out the RT Podcast survey about all the Kinda Funny Podcasts -- it only says "Kinda Funny Podcast" but they mean all of our podcasts. It takes just a few minutes and helps our network understand what you like about us! kindafunny.com/podcastsurvey
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Pranksy
The Roper Report   -
00:06:30 - Phil Spencer responds to Project Spartacus - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:28:55 - Several PlayStation Studios Asked to Put Their Games on PC - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:29:11 - Awesome Games Done Quick 2022 Sets a New Record By Raising Over $3.4 Million for Charity
00:43:24 - Activision Blizzard has gotten rid of almost 40 employees for workplace misconduct - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:45:54 - Video Game CEOs Made Tens of Millions of Dollars in 2020 - Rebekah Valentine @ IGN
00:51:02 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:51:56 - I finally did it. I got my LG OLED, - Jordan Lee Rowan
00:53:34 - You‘re Wrong
00:55:08 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary Whitta
